name: Oran's Table
summary:
Oran challenges you to take a seat at his table in this thoughtful puzzler.
Use the unique movements of each piece to cover every portal. You'll need to step, slide, jump, swap, shift, mimic and connect your way to the solution.
You must think creatively: pieces working in harmony create paths greater than the sum of their parts.
Controls are simple. Tap to reveal range, and tap again to move.
Features over 120 handmade puzzles, 6 unique pieces, and a few surprises which only the most devoted players will discover.
Play the 1st 16 puzzles free, and pay only once to play the rest.
